detectors.description:
ExchangesAuthority.isAuthority(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#483-488) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-accounts[_authority].groups[true].authority (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#487)

ExchangesAuthority.isWhitelister(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#638-643) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-accounts[_whitelister].groups[true].whitelister (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#642)
solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Parameter Owned.setOwner(address)._new (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#37) is not in mixedCase

setOwner(address) should be declared external:
	- Owned.setOwner(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ExchangesAuthority.sol#37-44)
